Description: The story of Mia Sicht, a princess who faces her fate in a world on the verge of destruction!

There's a high school in South Korea filled with palm trees?!
The tumultuous growth journey of real high school girls, both intoxicated and exhausted by palm trees, is captured in four images.
Coco Stew will bring fun, laughter, and empathy!

A husband who enjoys a double life, suspecting and enraged by his wife, yet fantasizing about her leaving her for another man, is suddenly caught in a text message, forcing him to make a choice.

Is this dangerous feeling truly love?
The truth gradually emerges before a desire that defies comprehension.

Su-ah was born color-blind, but when she finds someone she likes, she gains the ability to see all the colors associated with that person. Eun-woo, also color-blind, sees color through Su-ah, and through each other, their black-and-white world is filled with warm hues.

During high school, Yeon-woo's mother, unable to bear the burden of her family, remarried and became Woo-hyuk's stepmother.
Yeon-woo, struggling financially, unable to afford even cup ramen or kimbap, turns to her mother for help, but all she receives is a sharply drawn line between them.
Yeon-woo, now a stranger to her mother, uses Woo-hyuk's blushing face to swear revenge on them.
As adults, Woo-hyuk and Yeon-woo reunite through a friend.
Yeon-woo's persistent efforts lead to repeated encounters, and a drunken Woo-hyuk forces them to have a romantic night together.
Yeon-woo calmly threatens Woo-hyuk with a photo she'd taken, intending to exact revenge on the wounds she'd inflicted.

English Title: Is love delicious fried as well?
Description: Let's forget the hardships with chicken! The love stories of the three siblings, each made with chicken.

Geo and his family go camping on an island.
On what seemed like a fun-filled camping day, a storm forces the family to abandon their campsite.
The storm forces them to settle down at the only inhabited pension.
Soon after, ominous incidents unfold.
Everyone here is suspicious!
In this eerie pension...
On this terrifying uninhabited island...
Will Geo and his family make it out alive?

A slapstick comedy about the newly adult protagonist Han Moo-sik, his family, and those around him!

The episodic gag comic that formed the basis for "The Laughing Gag Club."
If a man stays a virgin for 26 years, he becomes a wizard!? The story of the protagonist, a punk who stayed a virgin for 26 years, who becomes a wizard by making the legend come true!

Self-proclaimed "Master of the Earth," he's a global troublemaker. He can enter any place, pretend to be a landlord, and even use his telekinesis to wreck cars. But no one—not the police, not the military, not the prison—can stop him!

One day, Hyun, who heard an unidentified noise coming from outside the hallway, leaves the classroom and encounters Bada dancing in the dance studio. Even with the music turned off, Bada follows the noise, discovering Bada hiding in a cabinet. Believing a stalker has followed her, Bada refuses to push her away. Before she knows it, Bada realizes that Hyun has become special to her.

A bubbly and cheerful daily life unfolds among these five people: a nine-year-old girl named Han Da-rae, her childhood friend Park Kang-woo, Da-rae's unrequited love interest, 21-year-old Park In-woo, his girlfriend Oh Se-hee, and Da-rae's older brother Han Shin-hae.
This is a healing, everyday drama centered around a cute love triangle.

After her first college club experience ended badly, Lee Ji's attitude toward relationships shifts and she becomes obsessed with club life.
However, as she spends time with her club senior, Pyo Seon-woo, she finds herself drawn to him. However, memories of her previous club experience cause her to avoid him.
Can these two truly become a club?

Han Si-woo lost his left leg in a childhood accident.
He suffered trauma from the stigma and bullying that plagued him throughout his school years, but he was introduced to skateboarding after being fitted with a smart prosthetic leg.
His incredible balance and skill earned him a spot in the skateboarding crew, "Extreme Crew."
Within the crew, Si-woo faces formidable rivals, and even outside the crew, numerous obstacles threaten Si-woo.
Can Si-woo overcome all this and prove his potential by competing in the national team trials?
This is a coming-of-age story about a one-legged boy with a prosthetic leg, an extreme sports team.

The female protagonist, who has a strong desire to escape from this shackle that is called fate but feels like a curse, is unable to do anything because misfortune befalls her the more she tries to escape. She ends up two-timing two men.

The perilous cohabitation of Antonio, a talking dog, and Aim, a 30-year-old single woman, begins.
This fantasy drama will captivate viewers with its heart-fluttering portrayal of Antonio's protection of Aim, and the bond between their friendship and comfort.
Season 1
A bizarre talking dog suddenly appears in the boring daily life of Aim, a 33-year-old office worker.
A hilarious episode unfolds as the talking dog Antonio and the timid Aim cohabitate.
Season 2
Antonio, who lands a job as a dog communicator on "Welcome to Fifty Dogs," acts as an interpreter between people and their dogs, resolving their conflicts.
Season 3
Antonio is not a dog, but actually a person!?
The secret past that forced Antonio and Aim to meet is gradually revealed!
Season 4
Antonio travels back in time to meet Aim from the past!
He cares for Aim, a former loner, like a soulmate.

One day, a truck driver suddenly experiences a strange change in his gaze while waiting at a traffic light. He drives recklessly, causing a three-car pileup that kills 12 people and then plunges into a river.

Is he possessed?
Dr. Cheon, an exorcist who doesn't believe in ghosts but is driven by money, becomes embroiled in this case alongside a conman who makes money selling fake ghosts and Oh Yu-kyung, a woman who claims to see ghosts.
They uncover and solve the mystery of someone committing crimes through astral projection.

Sarang, a puppy with two front legs who can only bow down, is a story of three children who live with their grandmother without parents, despite their impoverished background. Furthermore, despite being a disabled dog, they do their best to live with Sarang, showing the heartwarming, touching love that comes from family.

Seong-ah, an 18-year-old high school student who leads a double life as a normal high school girl by day and a shaman by night, is known for her bravery and keeps her busy. However, she dreams of a fateful love.
One day, the man of her destiny appears before her, but she gives up after realizing through her own magical powers that he is destined to die.
However, upon reuniting with the man who transferred to her class, she resolves to save him, Bae Gyeon-woo, from his tragic fate.
However, Gyeon-woo loathes shamans to the point of trembling, and continually pushes Seong-ah away...
Can Seong-ah kill two birds with one stone: save Gyeon-woo from his fate and win him over as her boyfriend?

In 2124 AD, humanity's obsession with virtual sex has led to sperm and egg degeneration, rendering conception impossible. Scientist Sergei decides to reignite humanity's sexual desires by gathering men and women from around the world, categorized by race, size, and preferences, at a space station called NASSA and having them have sex.

Teddy, falsely accused and moved from the capital to a remote village, meets Ailee, known as the witch's daughter.
As the son of a wizard, Teddy is repeatedly warned by his father never to use magic, but he ends up using it while helping Ailee.
This leads to Ailee's further identification as a witch and her persecution.
Growing up like this, Teddy, seeing Ailee's lack of emotion,
desires to help her find her own. He learns from Milan, Ailee's sole caregiver, about Ailee's mother, the "witch," and the "plague."
What exactly is the connection between the witch and the plague, and what led Ailee to this life?
Tagline: In the past, we hear about Ailee's mother, the 'witch', and the 'sickness'.

Description: The owner, a Hawaiian shirt-wearing, 365-day-a-year-old, the blunt, chic manager, Hoon, and their strangely shabby cafe are increasingly running at a loss.

Through intense training, Tasik aims to become a righteous hero by defeating various masters. However, Tasik redefines the meaning of righteousness and approaches it with a quirky sense of humor, creating a hero gag webtoon.

Noise, a fourth-year student in the Department of Furniture Design, returns to school, meticulously planning her grueling daily schedule. However, annoying things begin to happen to her.
When Iz loses her diary, a strange man she's never met before reveals her deadly secret.
This man, Woo Yoo-jin, seems to enjoy Noise's frustrations and sees through her.
Then one day, Woo Yoo-jin suddenly proposes a collaboration with Noise for the <SHEPHERD> contest, a long-time dream. What on earth is his motive in approaching her?

Yunseul, a perennial Musuri candidate born between a human woodcutter and a fairy! Namwoo, a dirt spoon human being who is being chased by his con artist mother! The mountain spirit who rules Samgaksan Mountain, the only one in the heavens and earth, a golden spoon! Namwoo, a good young man, escapes from his creditors and climbs Bukhansan Mountain. He saves a deer by chance and, as luck would have it, that day happens to be the mountain spirit's appointment day, so the fairies come down to the sky to bathe, and he tells them where to go? What time of day is it in the city? He asks him to steal the fairy clothes. Namwoo, who refuses, ends up becoming a human who steals the fairy clothes due to a misunderstanding. This theft falls on Yunseul, a Musuri who failed to protect the fairy clothes, and her path to becoming a fairy is blocked. Meanwhile, the newly appointed mountain spirit Hu falls in love with Yunseul, who has returned the fairy clothes and wears them to a party as the dress code. Honest Namwoo also approaches Yunseul to clear up the misunderstanding and feels love. However, Yunseul does not want to love a human like her mother again, so she experiences conflict and confusion. Amidst a turbulent love story, she faces a happy choice: accept the love of a human named Nam-woo or the blessings of a mountain spirit. Amidst this, she takes on the role of a fairy in an open audition. This modern adaptation of the fairy and the woodcutter motif tells the story of Yun-seul, who strives to become a fairy through her own efforts, and the mountain spirit and human, who have a crush on Yun-seul and help her in their own way. A tiki-taka love triangle romance between these two individuals with vastly different social standings! TOP

In an effort to give up her six-year crush, Seo-yoon impulsively meets a named user who posts one-night stands on a gay app.
But what appears before her is Do-jin, her brother, whom she has a crush on.
Do-jin, who has been living a double life under strict supervision, is discovered by Seo-yoon.
And Seo-yoon, determined to seize this opportunity, boldly declares that she wants to be Do-jin's sex partner.
"Hyung, don't you want to have sex with me?"

A high school girl, ranked last in her class, suddenly becomes the world's most powerful hero, the only one who can prevent the end of the world!

In 100 days, the heroes learn that Earth is doomed.

They receive a revelation that only one 100% hero can prevent the end, more than a million 99% heroes. They decide to pass on their powers to a special hero who can absorb the power of all heroes...

Sia, a quirky girl who seems to lack any sense of duty, declares her intention to become a hero, hoping to impress her senior, Kang Shin.

Will we be able to protect Earth?

Ga-eun runs a small workshop in her neighborhood.
The familiar house next door has become a construction site, and now a fierce and fierce neighbor unlike anything she's ever seen has moved in.
With high walls and a constant stream of women coming and going, and the fact that he's naked in broad daylight, she knows he's no ordinary man.
Ga-eun vows to avoid men as much as possible, but...
"Who came in without permission?"
"Who dropped this in front of my house?"
"Did you climb over the wall just to deliver this?"
Her neighbor, Kang Si-wan, is unfamiliar, suspicious, and even prickly.
Can Ga-eun live peacefully with this arrogant neighbor?
A bittersweet romance between a man and a woman caught up in their own prejudices!

Harold, who succeeded in stealing Estella, the jewel stolen by Surya, but is caught as a spy and on the run,

accidentally opens a dimensional gate and arrives in modern-day South Korea, where Seojin lives.
Unable to grasp the situation, Harold, under the influence of hallucinogens since his escape, relies on his mental fortitude. However, upon seeing Seojin, who rescued him, he faints.

Having hallucinated, he sees his fiancée and Seojin overlapping, and they become physically intimate.
The next day, Harold has no memory of Seojin, but he finds himself haunted by her, and he manages to capture her and begin living together.

Bunhee and her family head to the countryside for their younger sister's treatment.
What they thought was an ordinary rural village is actually a goblin village. The goblins, unimpressed by the human intrusion, play all sorts of pranks on Bunhee and her family in an attempt to drive them out.
However, with the help of Bunhee, who is resilient despite the goblins' antics, and the goblin Kang-jun, Bunhee and her family settle down in the village and begin their life among the goblins.

Because it's based on a movie, there are spoilers for Schrödinger.
However, these spoilers may or may not be present, or even if they are, you may not notice them.
A comic that always surpasses imagination and is below common sense!
Once you start reading, you'll never go back to normal life.
I'm only taking one medication! It's all about "boogie movies."

Adult BL web novelist Gong Chan-hyuk receives an offer to produce a drama based on his work.
Having never wanted his work to be adapted into a film, Chan-hyuk is initially reluctant. However, he's offered a meeting, and heads to the location where he encounters Lee Hyuk-soo, the star of the upcoming drama.
Chan-hyuk has always been a devoted fan of Hyuk-soo. Shocked to see the person he'd dreamed of as a side dish right before his eyes, Chan-hyuk agrees to Hyuk-soo's invitation to visit his house, leading to the discovery of a previously lofty fan fiction he'd written about Hyuk-soo...
However, Hyuk-soo makes a surprising offer:
"Shall we just do this?"

Sa-hee, a young girl, gave her boyfriend, Se-bin, a confession bracelet, only to be rejected. She became a stubborn, stubborn woman. 
Just turning 20, she accidentally witnesses Se-bin kissing Noah.
Before the shock and confusion even faded, their strange relationship spiraled into chaos.

Amidst the shock and confusion, they begin to cohabitate under the same roof.

Young-hee, the only male caregiver in a household populated entirely by women, is thrust into a secret space between two sisters.
The sudden arrival of a strange man opens up a secret space between the two sisters.
Young-hee vacillates between her sister and her brother, her instincts faltering, and watching her, she finds herself drawn into a whirlpool of inexplicable excitement...
A secret, sexual story of sisters unfolding in a forbidden setting.

A high school girl loses her family in a murder and the killer who murdered her family.
An ordinary high school girl's life is turned upside down when a murderer brutally murders her family.
The girl, who remembers the killer's face, confronts him, kidnaps him, and holds him captive in her home.
After being confined, tortured and engaged in one-sided conversations, she begins to suspect that he may not be the killer.
The two men and women, whose roles are reversed, embark on a strange and dangerous cohabitation.

Four panels is too many! A super-slim two-panel gag cartoon that defies common sense!
It's only two panels, but the author's unexpected ideas transform even the most ordinary of everyday moments into hilarious jokes!
Even if we all brainstorm together after seeing the first panel, a day isn't enough to predict how the next situation will unfold.

A woman nearing 50 is a fan of idols?
And that's my mom?! Her reckless mother secretly text-voted for a music show event on Ire's phone.
Suddenly, the broadcasting station notifies her that she's won, and the ultra-popular idol group "Nier" appears in front of her house.
Ire, who has no interest in idols, is lured by the appearance fee and signs up for the TV show.
Ire, who distrusts handsome men, and Min-hoo, who takes pride in his idol career,
continue to clash...
Will "Our Family's Idol" be able to end successfully?!

After seven years of dating, Da-seul and Beom find themselves growing weary of each other's recurring arguments and lack of communication.
Da-seul avoids situations, and Beom lacks the courage to resolve them. As these situations persist, their relationship begins to crack.
Finally, believing they are meant for each other, Beom attempts to end their relationship with Da-seul.
But fearing losing the past, he refuses to tell her they want to break up, suggesting they take time.
Can these two ever reconnect with their old relationship?

Kim Joo-young slipped on an icy road and met an absurd death.

"I've worked so hard to live... It's too unfair to die like this!"

Even the Grim Reaper must have felt sorry for her death, and he offers her a way to live.
"You can live if you receive the breath of the next King of Hell, who is currently in this world."

"Receiving the breath...?"
"There's a better way, right? Kiss!"

If you want to live, kiss King of Hell!
Will Joo-young truly be able to receive the breath of Hae-in, the prickly King of Hell?

Webtoon artist Will heads to Busan in search of new material. There, he meets Mary, a woman he finds charmingly innocent on the outside but with a tough-guy heart. He begins to feel more and more like a woman...
It turns out Will and Mary aren't just the same age, they're also 12 years apart!
A real-life love story of a couple from Seoul and Busan, the same zodiac sign.

When Ora's younger brother contracts a mysterious illness, he visits a shaman.
The shaman tells Ora that he must consistently perform ancestral rites to the "Hangbyeonsin" for ten years to recover.
Ora continues to perform the ancestral rites for ten years, but when the college entrance exam coincides with the holiday, he overturns the ancestral rite table in despair.
Of course, the feces he was serving are with him!
Suddenly, with a loud bang, he thinks the feces have exploded, but instead of feces, a handsome man appears before Ora.
The handsome man introduces himself as the "Hangbyeonsin" "Wannora."
Thus begins Ora and Nora's tumultuous cohabitation!
After losing his father, a troublemaker named Lucky appears in the desolate house! A poignant pet drama about a family oblivious to their dog's strength.

The original twist-themed gag comic from "Gauss Electronics" artist Baek-su Kwak!
Every episode features different characters and unexpected twists, creating a delightful, traumatic experience!
A castle guard. The first to realize the world is strange. He often says cool things.

To earn a scholarship, Hadam applies for an overseas exchange program to improve her GPA. Contrary to the professor's assertion that the program would naturally be held between same-sex couples, the school's absurd mistake forces her to live with Peter Erin, a male exchange partner from France.

Will Hadam and Erin overcome the on-campus grade war and language barrier to finally confess their feelings for each other?

A thrilling cohabitation romance begins under one roof.

Spring 2030. One day in March, Betelgeuse in the Orion constellation explodes as a Type 2 supernova. A series of unexplained electronic malfunctions, communication failures, and loss of contact with exploration equipment and spacecraft leave Earth completely isolated from the universe. A confused humanity finds itself staring at a blue star appearing in the sky day and night. Amidst this unsettling social climate, high school student Ju-myeong, unable to overcome the psychological burden, overcomes the stress and impulsively attempts to jump from a rooftop. Yoon-so, a classmate, rushes to stop him. Ju-myeong witnesses Yoon-so wielding mysterious powers and begins a new life through her. Yoon-so, a new intelligent life form, is not human. And Ju-myeong, a human, must battle these strange yet familiar beings from beyond the tangled space and time... TOP
The story unfolds as the young man ‘Park Jin-gam’ is reborn as ‘Hero Steel Man’ for the future of the Republic of Korea.
The main characters of the national comics that dominated the 1980s and 1990s have made a strange return!
From a homeroom teacher in a ballet outfit to a black history teacher, the stories they experience unfold.

If you've ever done something so foolish that you can't even understand it yourself, suspect this guy!
Wang is back with Season 5!

Let's meet Weng as he takes on the small moments of his daily life!
In the sequel, the protagonist of the previous film, Dr. Cheon, accidentally goes to a village to do some reporting and ends up trapped in an unidentified village.

A tragedy brought on by a single, trivial action.
Deok-su, whose life is a miserable one, has had its ups and downs.
He's a hapless fool whose first day of dating ends in a breakup.
He looks through a crack and discovers a bagel girl living next door!
One day, he decides to clean his house, and a crack appears.
Through the crack, he catches sight of the bagel girl's (Ga-hee) fantastic body. The pleasure of peeking? Is that fleeting?
A few days later, a burglar breaks into her (Ga-hee) house, and Deok-su rescues her.

Eunja, whose mother suffers from dementia, and her daughter, out of guilt for her, become a dementia caregiver.
She hopes to help families with dementia, hoping to prevent them from experiencing the same regrets she did.
This is a heartbreaking story about a dementia caregiver living day to day, and a mother and father gradually losing their memories of loved ones.

After hearing the news of her boyfriend's death, 'Cha-ra-ri' contemplates suicide. However, the method proves more painful than she expected, and she gives up. Then, she sees "The Bucket List" on TV. She remembers her and her dead boyfriend's bucket lists, and plans to complete them all before committing suicide.

In the late Joseon Dynasty, when mask dances were popular,

but one day, a mysterious power begins to manifest within the mask?

Shinwoo, a lowly boy despised by his villagers,

also gains new fighting abilities thanks to the power of his mask.

From that day on, a fierce battle begins in Joseon to steal the masks that grant him power, and to keep them!

Undisputed legend of Korean male idols, Cha Woon-young!
With his singing, acting, choreography, entertainment skills, and even a flawless private life, Woon-young has one secret: he was a gloomy, insignificant student weighing 105kg. He was also the operator of the fan cafe for the then-idol, Joo Shin-hye.
"Who is the operator? He must be middle-aged, right?"
"He's at least a father. His speech is incredibly dignified."
Woon-young's serious and calm personality leads his fan cafe members to mistake him for a middle-aged man...
And thanks to this, his true identity as an idol is completely hidden!
Meanwhile, Yoo Ye-seul, who met her partner on a virtual marriage variety show, begins to develop feelings for the uniquely charming virtual husband, Woon-young...

What if a handsome idol turns out to be a pervert with a mukbang fetish?
Ji-hoo, who has undergone rigorous body management since childhood, finds himself attracted to the sight of a happy eater. Then, he encounters Seo-yoon, a 200% perfect mukbang girl.
At first, he's captivated by her eating style, but as time goes by, he develops a genuine affection for her, and their romance becomes more than just a fan.

Haewon and Taeju were best friends in elementary school. When Taeju went abroad to study, their relationship naturally grew apart.
A few years later, Taeju returned to Korea and began searching for Haewon, but she was nowhere to be found. Instead, a girl named Haeyoon began to appear in his mind, and he became overcome with inexplicable emotions.
Will their friendship ever blossom into love?

A coming-of-age romance story about overcoming the conflict between the past and present between the foolishness and obsession hidden within the comfort of first love, "Ho-rang," and the adventure, challenge, and escape shown by new love, "Kkamang."

English Title: We were all someone's first love.
Description: Choi Dasol is a tall, handsome boy with piercings. He has had a long-standing crush on Seo-gyeol, whom he met in elementary school. However, Seo-gyeol doesn't remember Dasol.

"It's not a crime to be ugly, but it is a crime not to look good."
Yeseo, born with perfect looks, inherited her mother's beautiful features, and was brainwashed by her mother's lookism from a young age.
Believing that looks equal power and the ability to attract wealth, her mother diligently cultivated herself, married a wealthy man, and gave birth to Yeeseo. She never neglected her personal grooming, and she also enforced this on Yeeseo.
Having a beautiful mother who was envied by everyone, and people who were always kind to her, Yeeseo naturally became immersed in this lookism.
When Yeeseo entered her twenties, her father had an affair with a younger, prettier woman than her mother. Betrayed and shocked, the mother and daughter left the family home. Initially comfortable, they were so obsessed with their appearance that they were unable to find work. In this example, she did not understand men who were relatively less knowledgeable about makeup than women, and opened a fitness + plastic surgery broker + fashion + makeup multi-shop, calling it the <Face Beautification Department>, a company that transforms these men.
The timid and passive female protagonist, Podong, plans a trip she had always dreamed of after quitting her job.

Kim Hyuk, an ordinary high school student whose only interest is being popular. Desperate for attention, he puts on a hoodie he found at a secondhand store. But what the heck? A strange power envelops him, and he levitates, granting him the power to fly! He dons a hoodie imbued with the legendary power of Shakti, possessing the power of an ancient god, and becomes a K-superfashion high school hero!

High school student Gona owns a cat.
But this cat, "Ttukkeop," can speak human language!
A cat's life isn't all that different from a human's, is it?
This is a real-life story about a cat and a human sharing joys and sorrows.
Tagline: A real butler story about cats and humans living together through thick and thin.

Description: In this world, animals that have acquired human form and intelligence are called "new humans." It's become commonplace in the entertainment industry to market the unique qualities of new humans as idol charm.

Jinyoung's humble, harmonious family becomes a target of the so-called "framing business," fabricating scandalous corruption by the privileged class to falsely accuse the socially disadvantaged. But Jinyoung has a better plan. Falsification is falsification, and Jinyoung and his friends launch a counterattack. TOP

6,000 sexy comedy episodes total <Melancholy>
Nyangi and Meongi present a cheeky and thrilling sexy comedy.
Day, a dad who hates working. Day, whose story is relatable to any office worker, somehow seems endearing.

A poor girl named Se-hyeon goes hiking and receives help from a strange man. It turns out he's a gumiho! He demands her energy in return for her rescue. Se-hyeon uses this as an excuse to give him the energy, and decides to exploit the gumiho in return. Meanwhile, Joseon's strongest male idol competition, with the potential for huge profits, is underway, and Se-hyeon, a woman, disguises herself as a man and enters alongside the gumiho!

Bong-sil is diligently preparing for employment. Until she finds a job, she works part-time at her mother's sushi restaurant, Hope Sushi. Korea's first seasonal seafood webtoon showcases the various adventures Bong-sil encounters while working at the sushi restaurant, along with a delicious glimpse into seasonal seafood!

At the Gilim Middle School reunion, everyone eagerly awaits the arrival of the trio of star nymphos.
The reason is none other than the fact that one of the trio of famous nymphos has been dating Do Do-yeon, a former school outcast, for three years!

What's more, due to a simple incident involving a small box of snacks, Do Do-yeon becomes the target of the nymphos, and thus, the ostracized student body.

However, Bae Cha-seok feels sorry for Do Do-yeon, who remains confident despite being bullied, and gradually develops feelings for her and begins to approach her sincerely.

Do Do-yeon, who has received his sincerity, opens her heart, and the two begin dating, but she's afraid to tell the other two members of the trio.

Will she be able to keep this secret forever?

The story is about a hybrid of an angel and a demon child, and among them, the Grand Hybrid, which has the best bloodline, becomes a ‘fraudulent character’ that can blow up the universe the moment it awakens.

Gayoung, in her late twenties, finds herself in a mess, both at work and in love.
After eight years, her boyfriend, Sungjun, breaks up with her. She cries herself to sleep. She wakes up looking like she did eight years ago, in high school.

Is this a dream or reality?

Will she be able to find both work and love this time?
People often reveal their secrets like this, presenting themselves as "extras" rather than "main characters" in the story.

There may be people who haven't seen it at least once, but there's no one who's only seen it once!
A unique, everyday gag cartoon that creates new fun, without being too familiar or unfamiliar!

Genre: Romance; gag; fantasy; story; growth; dailylife; school
Description: Judamu, a smartphone addict, is constantly on his phone, but during gym class, a ball flies at him and shatters his phone. After scheduling a repair, he crouches at home, grieving. Then, his phone transforms into a black man and appears before him. What is he, and why has he appeared?

Five female students wake up to find themselves in an empty school. They struggle to escape, but none of them can. Suddenly, someone wearing a rabbit mask appears and begins killing the students one by one, memories gradually blossoming in their minds. It turns out that the surviving child was being bullied by the four students, and someone was murdering them for an experiment!

Nabibi can create a "cocoon" and be reborn at any time after turning 17.
In her second year of middle school, Bibi, who was bullied by her only friend Dahee, is reborn with a new, pretty appearance and enters high school to start anew. However, Bibi feels a sense of disconnect with each change, and Dahee asks her, "You don't seem like you. Who are you?" and disappears.
Bibi runs away to the neighborhood where she briefly lived as a child and begins high school. Her situation worsens when she meets Bang Yeonwoo, a fellow middle school student. To make matters worse, Yeonwoo catches her emerging from her cocoon.

Ae-jin grew up being compared to her pretty older sister. However, her sister dies in an accident, and she misses the girl who was always kind and a source of pride for her. Imagining her older sister as a high school student, Ae-jin begins uploading photos of herself to social media, heavily Photoshopping them, and eventually becomes a social media star with 700,000 followers. She begins a double life: Ae-jin, the outcast at school, and Genie, the social media star online.

Mismatched personalities, incompatible lifestyles, and walls that don't soundproof even at night. 
The tumultuous roommate life of Park Tae-joo, stressed by his every move, and Joo Ha-jin, who can't live without sex, begins!

Junior priest Sim Woo-jun conceals his identity and goes undercover as a loner and a bread shuttle to perform exorcisms on a group of bullies who have been possessed by demons.
But just as the demon-possessed bullies are about to be attacked by a powerful force, he meets Munchkin Prayer, who easily subdues them, and shaman Jin Hyo-jeong!
A school action fantasy about religious exorcists who unite to prevent the resurrection of Satan.

Twelve-year-old Min-hee is involved in a car accident and is raised by a stranger, leaving her son Pil-ho as her only family member.
One day, Min-hee gets caught up in a fight with a bully, but thanks to a man, the situation is resolved without major damage.
However, this man turns out to be a new student teacher who has moved into the same apartment!
Mu-yeol, the man who taught her the meaning of love.
Min-hee, the woman who breathes warmth into her lonely life.
Pil-ho, the man who has been forced to hide his love for a long time.
Will their unrequited love ever come true?

"Let me live like you."
Miro, the seemingly perfect influencer, is met with a fan who knows all about her past and lies.
This woman uses this to demand more and more from Miro, pushing her to become an influencer. What is her true motive?

Shin Do-yoon returns to his village after his father goes missing while studying abroad. He is puzzled by the villagers' apparent reluctance to talk about his father. However, he soon learns that a body washed ashore by a typhoon is his father's.

Genre: Romance; Drama; Fantasy; Exorcism; Horror; Campus
Description:
Chae-na, who blames herself for everything and insists on going with him, sends Eun-seop into a state of shock,
feeling as if she's about to collapse, clutching the back of his neck... What's with this girlfriend he can't even remember? A ghost?!!
No, but more importantly, are you really my ex-girlfriend?
Three years have passed, and if a ghost doesn't receive a man's yang, it becomes an evil spirit?
He wants to run away, but he feels sorry for her and thinks he can help her.
But appeasing this stubborn ghost, Chae-na, is no easy feat.
Will Hyun Eun-seop, the most cowardly of cowards,
succeed in bringing his ex-girlfriend, the ghost Chae-na Kim, to Buddhahood?
A family of far from smart people, filled with bumbling, quirky episodes of everyday life. We'll make you laugh with just a four-panel cartoon!

In-hoon, now a college student, encounters his runaway pet dog, Popo, in human form! However, In-hoon, who has been distant due to trauma from interpersonal relationships, is bewildered by Popo's sudden appearance as a human. Furthermore, the body inhabited by Popo's soul turns out to be that of Lee-ju, In-hoon's best friend from middle school, but who grew apart due to misunderstandings and arguments. What will be the fate of these two?

This is the story of Jeong-yoon, an ordinary high school lesbian who accidentally sends a KakaoTalk message to Do-young, a classmate with the same name and zero social skills, in an attempt to somehow recapture her ex-girlfriend. This is the story of Jeong-yoon's absurd antics, and her subsequent attempts to find a new love.

Yeoul's childhood friend, Hosu, unexpectedly confesses to her, but she rejects him, and they graduate from middle school on an awkward note. However, on the day of her high school entrance ceremony, Yeoul freezes when she sees Hosu in his school uniform.
Yeoul pleads with him to return to their old ways. Hosu agrees, adding,
"Just remember that we're not just friends like we used to be."
After hearing those words, Yeoul's mind begins to wander for some reason, and their high school life begins.

These heroes, who are under surveillance by authorities for possessing superpowers, consider their mediocre, half-assed abilities a nuisance, disrupting their ordinary lives.
Faced with the competitive world they've lived through since adolescence, the self-reflection surrounding their superpowers, and the unexpected onset of puberty, they band together for a single reason: to save their parents, the first-generation heroes who possess the same superpowers as them, and who possess them to the fullest.
This is the story of these heroes, who, as they fight against criminals together, learn to recognize and utilize their abilities as their own, becoming accepted members of society.

Ian, possessing the ability to foresee the lifespans of others, blames himself for his inability to do anything about his parents' deaths, and chooses a life of complete solitude. Then, Nayoung, who is nearing death, appears before Ian. He pretends not to notice her, but when Nayoung lands a job at Ian's cafe, Ian's ignorance deepens the more he ignores her, becoming increasingly entangled.

Biyeon, a rabbit spirit who cared for rabbits, finds a small, cute baby dragon, badly injured.
From that day on, she begins to dream of her past life.
Biyeon, the rabbit spirit, is the lowest of the divine beasts,
and Doryu, the dragon, the highest of the divine beasts, born with a prophecy that he would destroy the nation of Un.
Their seemingly coincidental encounter begins the awakening of Soseon's other self from her past life.

Heo Seok-ju heads to a restaurant, following the trail of Kim Tae-soo, who has trampled his life.

One dark night, Seung-woo, about to close the restaurant, is so kind to Seok-ju, whom he meets for the first time, that he even welcomes him into his home, despite having nowhere else to stay.

"Kim Tae-soo and Im Seung-woo are brothers...?"

Seok-ju discovers that Tae-soo harbors lust for Seung-woo and tries to use him for revenge, but his kindness keeps drawing him in.

Genre: Gag; dailylife; fantasy; growth; story; romance; school
Description: Seom-ok, who was reborn as a human after nine reincarnations due to the power of the mountain god Myo-un, is threatened with death by an evil spirit. To prevent this, Myo-un, who has been by Seom-ok's side for hundreds of years, goes undercover as a student at Seom-ok's school for the 'Jiseom-ok Health and Longevity Project'. Why is Seom-ok's life threatened by evil spirits, and why does the mountain god Myo-un try to protect Seom-ok until the end? TOP

When his girlfriend goes missing, Lee, a man overcome with depression, decides to commit suicide and heads into the mountains.

Vincet, a man who rescues him from a blizzard he thought would kill him, then demands a relationship with him, claiming it was love at first sight.

The two begin living together in a mountain cabin trapped in a blizzard.

Heo Gyun, accused of treason, confronts political conspiracy with food!
Heo Gyun seeks out his best friend, but he is dead, and only his daughter welcomes him. He discovers his friend's daughter, Eun-ok, has a knack for cooking, and together they unravel the political conspiracy.

A mysterious woman appears before those who believe their lives will change if they simply change their appearance, handing them the profiles of three beauties.
"Choose, and I'll transform you into one of these three."
The despairing individuals, upon selecting one, are instantly transformed into their chosen appearance, and they cheer.
The joy is short-lived, however, as she issues a warning:
"You are now this person's doppelganger. The moment you make eye contact with this person, you will die."
Will these people, with their changed appearances, be able to avoid encountering their doppelgangers and live the lives they desire?

Long ago, a witch who interfered with the love of a princess and a prince was punished by being condemned to never love again, only to support someone else's love.
Ma Do-hee, a job-seeking witch who, thanks to an ancestor's curse, is forced to witness only the love of others.
Ha Tae-jung, a meticulous wizard who seeks to lead a company without the power to manipulate people's hearts.
And Lee Han-gyeol, Do-hee's first love, appears like a comet.
Will Ma Do-hee ever find love? The perilous journey of a witch's life as she fights to break the curse!

It was actually drawn with a name pen!
All the main characters are adorable animals, and among them, the couple, rabbit Woogi and turtle Boogi, present a relatable story.
A heartwarming everyday webtoon that combines sweet love stories with bittersweet life stories.
Tagline: A story of empathy shown by the cute animals that make up all the main characters, including the rabbit Woogi and the turtle Boogi, who are in charge of the couple.

Description:
One day, everyone becomes a zombie. They must survive in a world where they are all turned into zombies.
The young people band together to devise a plan to defeat the zombies, but ultimately fail, only to discover their own selfishness.
As the situation worsens, the zombies mutate, eventually becoming intelligent and attacking people, and hope gradually fades.
Kijun discovers that a young girl is alive downstairs, and to rescue her, he steps outside for the first time in three years.
Seong-Hoon calls the zombies ‘new humans’ and becomes their king, starting to create a new world.

Through intense training, Tasik aims to become a righteous hero, defeating various masters.

However, Tasik redefines the meaning of righteousness and approaches it with a quirky,

a humorous hero gag webtoon.

Despite living apart from their parents, the three Imoojin siblings faithfully fulfill their respective roles.
One day, they are chosen (!) by a stray cat, and a strange fellow (Wang) also joins the family.
What changes will occur in the peaceful daily lives of the three siblings?

Nam Joo-ri, the girlfriend he truly loved. Two years ago, she suddenly left him, but now she's reappearing as the fiancée of his senior colleague. Su-han is invited to her home by chance, and Joo-ri gradually becomes closer to him. To make matters worse, his coworker, Ah-young, also pursues him with her provocative sexiness. Who will Su-han choose between the two women?

Lisbell, a demonic hybrid, summons the dream demon "Robernia," whom she knew from the past, to enter Kendon's dreams and seduce him, promising to lower his grades. Lobernia enters Kendon's dreams, appearing as the object of Kendon's most intense emotions. However, from the day after the contract was signed, Kendon blushes and runs away whenever he sees Lisbell. What dream could have caused Kendon's behavior to change so drastically in just one day?

"It's the last one, so shall we go have sex?"
Fatigued by the constant discord, announcer Cha Ga-eun and doctor Ha Tae-oh decide to divorce. A single remark to his wife on the way to court ignites a new spark in their relationship.

48 years old, the age of her future husband.
Song Yeon-ju was forced into an unwanted marriage for money.
Her family, demanding she repay the favor of raising her, completely ignored her wishes.
“I don’t want a young and pretty mother like you.”
Kang Yi-won, expecting a son two years younger than her.
He was the only one who challenged the marriage that was proceeding smoothly.
“So I’m thinking of stealing you away.”
He suggested she choose him instead, asking if she really wanted to marry an old man, as if she were being sold for money.
“You’d rather have a young punk than an old guy, right?”
There was no other way.
If the reality was beyond her control, she was better off with this young and energetic man.

A dirty world that favors only monsters, an era of 1 million human unemployment!
Park Yeon, a job seeker
The time has come for him to go to school like everyone else, go to college like everyone else, date like everyone else, and get a job like everyone else.
But...
For a human at the bottom of the pyramid, with no magical abilities or racial traits,
getting a job is harder than reaching for the stars.
The only person he can rely on
is his girlfriend, Jiyu, who loves him the most in the world.
But then, one day, his girlfriend becomes the Demon Lord?

"Do you know me?"
"Should I just know?"
Only One reunites with Yuil, the culprit(?) who caused her heartbreak three years ago.
Liwon, who disliked her work, blocks her number when she sees her interest.
Liwon, who had never been rejected in her life,
becomes resentful of Riwon's cold treatment and pursues him relentlessly.
As a result, the two begin a relationship based on a strange misunderstanding about food and shelter.
Afterwards, she tries to avoid further entanglement, but Riwon accidentally ruins her work project.
And then, feeling it's the perfect opportunity, Only One offers to model for her graduation project to connect with Riwon.
"Play the piano nude...?"
So cute! The more she gets to know her, the more she finds herself helplessly drawn to Riwon, who, despite her cold exterior, has a charming side.
Although their personalities and tastes differ, Riwon gradually finds herself absorbed into her energetic work. Despite being seniors, the two had been keeping their distance from their studies due to their own circumstances.
They became a source of mutual inspiration, and as they spent more time together, their feelings for each other grew.

Two aliens who came to Earth to spy on the planet lose contact with their headquarters in an unfortunate accident, and have been living as Earthlings for over a decade.
In the meantime, their daughter is born and in her second year of middle school. The alien father is ignored both at work and at home. Longing for a life back home, where he was respected as a soldier, he receives a call from headquarters one day and decides to return to pick up his family in a month. However, he is met with opposition from his daughter, who refuses to return.
For the remaining month, the father plans to make his daughter "want to leave Earth."
In the final story, the Demoniacs, evil spirits who entered Korea through travelers from the Italian catacombs, dream of their children, the descendants of demons, prospering.

Harul, who was lured into a clinical trial by the promise of a high-paying part-time job, transforms into a cute puppy when the sun rises due to a side effect. Na-ri, who encounters Harul in his dog form and mistakes him for a stray, takes him in. Harul gradually develops feelings for Na-ri, who helped him while he was still a puppy. Na-ri, too, finds herself falling in love with Harul's kindness, without even realizing it.

Her name is "Dahae." Her social media is filled with racy photos and videos.
She uses recorded moaning sounds to arouse men, making them fall in love with her.
Jisoo, a college student, enjoys a lewd and debaucherous double life under the pseudonym "Dahae" through a secret anonymous blog.
She realizes true love and decides to end her life as Dahae.
But her life begins to be distorted by the man who knows her secret...

English Title: It was you from the beginning
Description:
She's been a sex cult member for years, trying to please each partner, flirting with them, and living in their homes.

As always, at the meeting place for the person who'll let her stay, "Kim Seo-ha"

"Why are you sitting here? I almost lost you... huh?"

She encounters Han Jae-won, a classmate who was famous in many ways during her school days.
Seo-ha is slightly surprised, but Jae-won doesn't seem to know Seo-ha very well.

So...

"I know it's our first time meeting, but please take care of your house~"

There's no reason to turn down this great opportunity.

Jiwon, unaware of Jeonghan's death, finds herself drawn to a married man 12 years her senior, yet chastises herself for not being able to do so. 
A romance between Jeonghan, torn between his deceased wife and his tutor, and Jiwon, who has a crush on a married man.

One day, after a night of drinking with his friends, he returns home and falls asleep. He dreams about the day he and Seojin kissed in high school. Why is the "mistake" he made, caught up in the high school atmosphere, suddenly appearing in his dreams? Thinking he's been away from dating for too long, Daun accidentally encounters Seojin, who seems uneasy.
And then, Seojin, unusually curious to see him, comes to visit him, and he feels unnecessarily stung.
He asks what mistake he made, but Seojin simply replies that they kissed.
Why is he suddenly acting like this after being friends for so long? Why is he so intent on Daun?

His hobby is shopping, his specialty is unboxing. Seo Do-ha lives for today.
One cold winter, kicked out of his home, he's introduced to a share house, HOME5, by his college junior, Woo-jae. A pretty cafe, a modern interior, worthy of a spot on In☆! He signs the contract and sees,
Huh? The landlord's name is... Oh Si-woon?
The story of two people who are each other's first loves begins again.

After losing her parents in a childhood accident, the national idol "Hallyu" is left with only her pet wolf, Luna. Then one day, Luna transforms into a human... She's a member of the "Wolrang Tribe," a tribe that can transform after receiving love from a human for ten years. And as they work together to stop another Wolrang Tribe wolf from going on a serial killing spree, their love for each other deepens.

"Don't ever enter that room." At a friend's request, she works at a performance venue for just one day.
The performance manager warned her. But...
"What are you doing coming in?"

She opens the door for a flustered employee,
and in the darkness, she encounters a man she shouldn't mess with.
Ji Se-hoon, a genius cellist recognized worldwide.
Ha-yeon runs away, afraid of the hand that grips her wrist tightly,
but he catches her and summons her.
"I told you I'll compensate you according to the law."
"The compensation I was talking about was you."

A dark side obscured by the halo of genius.
Her touch connects them once again.
Minji | “I wish someone would take me to fun places like the characters in movies and comics.”

One day in 2016, the phone rang, and the name on the line suddenly brought back memories of my teenage years.
Their story, a story that stretches back to the past.
He has the ambition to steal the right arm of the protagonist Midas, who creates gold, and use that ability to conquer the world.

Do Yoon, who has gained the ability to hear the inner voices of others due to stage trauma, and Jeong Su-ah, who secretly loved him, reunite as high school students. Unaware of Su-ah's condition, Yoon is the only one unable to hear her inner voice, and through Su-ah, he gradually heals his trauma.

English Title: Guess who my future husband is.
Description:
Oops, what a steal! I found a cell phone, but the wallpaper is... Me in a wedding dress?
By chance, she finds her own cell phone from the future, 10 years in the future.
The wallpaper changes every time she turns it on,
and she decides to find her husband. However, the more clues she uncovers,
the more lost she becomes...

Will "Yang Mi-rae," a high school student who dreams of romance,
find her husband through the clues and solve the mystery of the cell phone?
A heart-fluttering romantic comedy about a high school girl who, at the age when she's looking for a romantic relationship,
finds her married husband.

Son Da-eun, a 17-year-old girl who dreams of a fateful love,
moved to Seoul with her two older sisters, and from the first day, she keeps bumping into the man downstairs...
And even in the same class? Is this fate?!
The two become a couple thanks to the aggressive affection of Kim Seung-hyu, the man of her destiny. Just as they're about to find happiness, it's revealed that Seung-hyu, who she thought was being bullied, was actually the bully.
This is a classic school romance that depicts the innocent love and deep friendships of high school students.

Da-in and Si-hyeon are in the same class, but they've never spoken before, creating an awkward relationship.
One day, a strange man appears, claiming to be Si-hyeon from the future, and he claims to be Da-in's future love interest.
Da-in finds the stranger's words hard to believe, but as his predictions come true, she gradually comes to trust him.
When Da-in shows interest in Si-hyeon, rumors of a romantic relationship begin to spread among the class, and a subtle tension develops between them.
However, Si-hyeon has a twin who looks so identical it's hard to tell them apart.
What could the stranger's true identity be?

Hannah, raised in a single-parent household, runs away from home when she decides to go to college.
Hannah, forced to take responsibility for her own life, spends each day in a life of self-denial.
A handsome, well-dressed man appears before her.
Introducing himself as a demon, he offers Hannah one wish in exchange for her soul.
Without hesitation, Hannah pleads to stay by his side, and the demon accepts.
Thus begins a contractual relationship, wagering the soul of a human being.

Korean Title: Disobey the Duke if You Dare
English Title: Disobey the Duke if You Dare
Description:
You must never see the duke’s face.
After her second husband's death, Lily is forced into a third marriage by her father. Her new husband is rumored to be a monstrous warmonger, but to Lily's surprise, the Duke turns out to be a kind man and husband. There's just one catch... she must never see his face.
Tagline: YouTube Trailer

Description:
Can love transcend all boundaries?
The 200-year long peace in Mokrin's island tribe is broken when the warlike Gyui-heols arrive to demand open borders. What's more, Eonyeong, the son of their chieftess, falls hopelessly in love with Mokrin. Now it's up to her — will she spurn his affection or marry him for the sake of her people?
Tagline: A wonderful island world to explore through a romantic epic

Description: Sunwoo is a perfectly ordinary guy with a perfectly ordinary life. So it's no wonder he's enamored by his coworker Taemoon. The guy's handsome, charming, and a total ten! But when Sunwoo catches a glimpse of his crush's texts one day, he realizes that their days at work will be anything but ordinary.
Tagline: Love is like a punch to the face.

Description:
Falling star to superstar!
Yusung is destined to give up on his dream of becoming an idol and spend the rest of his days working as his crush's manager. That is, unless he reinvents his approach to being a trainee! What are these mysterious skill bars only he can see? Could they be the key to avoid a painful future and making his dreams for his creative and romantic life come true?
Tagline:
K-Pop
Seeing stats / knowing the future
Romance

Description:
Hale Windsor was a renowned hitman until he is betrayed and loses the love of his life. With nothing left to live for, he begins a war of revenge on the very organization he used to work for. That is, until he meets Marine, a girl who brings color back into his black and white existence.
But things are more complex for Marine, an unexceptional middle-manager who just learned her most competent-yet-challenging employee KILLS PEOPLE during his lunch hour!
The two end up an unlikely team to take on a global cartel, with a government sanction to kill.
Tagline: A dramatic action thriller with a hint of comedy and romance

Description:
"Devil, I don't want to marry him."
In hopes to escape a forced marriage, Giovinetta makes a wish to the devil to save her, but what she doesn't know are the consequences of her actions. Read the steamy story of a girl who just wants to be with the one man she is forbidden to love.
Tagline: YouTube Trailer

Description:
It's more than just coincidence.
Young Paljae drifts to the isle at world's end to be taken in by Munryeong, a hermit with a mysterious past. But when Paljae begins to waste away in the sun-bathed climate, Munryeong takes his little companion on a journey to the cold north that uncovers their forgotten past encounter.
Tagline: A journey that chronicles an epic love

Description:
Loving yourself is never easy.
There are countless ways to diet. So why are there no ways to quit? An intimate, cheerful tale of growth about a woman who has long struggled with body image issues and eating disorders.
Tagline: A first-person documentary about dieting and body image

Description:
He bought me for 50 sacks of rice.
Soongap is nearly beaten to death by his master when friendly giant Bongchun buys him and saves his life. Bongchun's blind mother is delighted, believing her son has finally brought home a bride. And the more Bongchun treats Soongap like his darling bride, the more things get heated...
Tagline: An unlikely love story

Description:
I'll be the one to save you this time.
While suffering from PTSD, Roman Brennon searches for pianist Yuri Jung's album. He finds it in a small store, but it's sold before Roman can buy it. It is here that he runs into Yuri himself, who has fallen ill and can no longer play the piano. Yuri once saved Roman, but can he return the favor?
Tagline: Music and passion collide

Description:
If only I could be the one to reach you...
After an ankle injury dashes Hoon’s hopes of becoming a basketball star, he begins to see a timer in the sky. He believes it’s a countdown to the day he dies, until he discovers one day that his classmate Haedam can see it too...
Tagline: A high concept elevating a gay romance

Korean Title: The Fallen Duke & the Knight Who Hated Him
English Title: The Fallen Duke & the Knight Who Hated Him
Description: After Duke Louison is given a second chance at life, he sets out to save the people he had so terribly failed by surrendering himself to the enemy. Yet little does he know that crossing paths with an enemy knight — the noble-hating Carlton — would become so... intimate. Things are about to get messy!
Tagline: Sleeping with the enemy... literally

Description:
You're the monster that can save me from this hell.
As soon as she comes of age, Linnea is married off to an aristocrat in exchange for a sizeable dowry. She finds solace in Aleksis, her new husband's son. However, terrible secrets surrounding the family come to light as soon as they cross the forbidden line. Will she be able to escape from this hell?
Tagline: A fresh take on vampires

Description:
From the high seas to high society.
When the infamous pirate Rosetta gets poisoned to death, she wakes up in the body of noble lady Leah. Now, to avoid a second death, Rosetta must play the part of a noble and... get engaged?! But to whom? Could it be to the strange admiral who has suddenly come chasing after "Rosetta"?
Tagline: One of the top webcomic titles in Japan (on the Piccoma platform)

Description:
Find your dad, or face death - again.
After working herself to death, Professor Jaehee Cheon is reincarnated as a princess in a fantasy novel. Now, she must find her father from the four gorgeous candidates before her to find her happy ending. Will Jaehee be able to survive in her second life?
Tagline: A wild isekai

Description:
Love is a fairytale. Or is it?
Stuttering lady Maximilian is forced into a marriage with Sir Riftan, but he leaves on a campaign after their wedding night. 3 years later, he triumphantly returns, ready to cherish her. All fairytales end with a wedding and a happily-ever-after. Their love began with a wedding — this is no fairytale.
Tagline:
YouTube Trailer #1
YouTube Trailer #2

Description:
Someone's tattooing Xin in his sleep.
On the night of his birthday, Xin, the sole heir of the powerful Zhou family, reunites with Lau, his clan guardian, and confides in him about the mysterious tattoo forming on his back. Lau begrudgingly sets off to investigate this strange phenomenon, but what secrets will he uncover along the way?
Tagline: LGBTQ+ romance blended with crime, action and thriller elements

Description: One day, top counterterrorism agent Hana Lee receives news of her twin brother's passing. Unable to accept the death of her only living relative, she sets out to uncover the truth. Along the way, she gets tangled up with the mysterious Eunseong Yoo and the cold-blooded mafia boss, Giulio Parenti.
Tagline: A spicy romance contrasted with an Elmore Leonard-style crime thriller

Description:
There is wonder to be found in books.
After returning home from a horrible first day at a new school, Julie is distraught to find that her mother's given away her favorite childhood book. Determined to get her comfort object back, she seeks out a used bookstore where she not only finds her book... but also a new world of possibilities!
Tagline: A sweet coming-of-age story

Description:
Diary of a 20-something caretaker.
After spending her entire life working in the fields and taking care of her family, Granny's been diagnosed with dementia — and I’m her new caretaker. Now I’m starting to understand the hardships of the women who’ve grown up in the patriarchy.
Tagline: A multi-generational heartfelt comedy

Korean Title: I Work at a Witch's Mansion
English Title: I Work at a Witch's Mansion
Description:
"What did I get myself into?!”
Elena works at a theater troupe as a cleaner with big dreams of making it on stage. But when the troupe is disbanded overnight, she’s forced to find a new job. Luckily, she stumbles upon an old mansion where she’s hired as a maid. But there’s something strange about the madam of the house...
Tagline: A soapy supernatural story that combines a playful aesthetic and a spooky atmosphere

Description:
May the best heir win!
Florist Riella never meant to catch the attention of Duchess Horssen with her shining flowers, and she certainly didn't mean to inherit her entire fortune! So when the enraged Grand Duke Hann appears before her to claim possession of the inheritance, what is she to do? Can she defend her newfound title?
Tagline: Rivals becomes lovers as they fight over an inheritance

Description:
Once an enemy, now a husband?
Femme fatale Veronica is sentenced to death for obsessing over the prince. With her life now in danger, she boards a ship to escape, unaware that it belongs to her archnemesis, the alluring Prince Halid. He agrees to help her, but only on the condition that she pretends to be his wife!
Tagline: YouTube Trailer

Fields Used: title_name_kr; title_name_en; pitch; description; tagline; genre
Description:
He suddenly looks like a snack!
Just dumped, Eva turns to the comfort of food to heal her broken heart. But little does she know that her childhood friend, James, may just be the comfort she needs! Can James help Eva cook up a cure for heartbreak? Or will it be a recipe for disaster?
Tagline: “Food is symbolic of love when words are inadequate”

Description:
Did you just imprint on me?!
After dying from overwork, Noa ends up possessing the body of Eleanora, the villainess from a novel. Noa simply wants to lead a peaceful life and tries not to interfere with the original story. That is, until a baby dragon that’s meant to imprint on the heroine imprints on her instead...
Tagline: An outcast heroine must raise a dragon, changing her fate.

Fields Used: title_name_kr; title_name_en; pitch; description; tagline; genre
Description: Angie enjoys an idyllic life of reading and embroidering on Cullinan Island. But everything changes when she's selected as the companion to Kylek, the enigmatic heir of House Blackwell. As their bond grows, extraordinary events unfold, unraveling Cullinan Island's long-kept secret.
Tagline: A memory-loss mystery with a romantic twist.

Korean Title: The Tale of the Frost Flower
English Title: The Tale of the Frost Flower
Description: Sabi is secretly in love with her childhood friend Yusu and wishes to marry him. But the day after her coming-of-age celebration, she finds herself embroiled in a scandalous rumor and suddenly engaged to the emperor's son. Will Sabi be able to clear her name and find her way back to her true love?
Tagline: An imperial scandal and a shattered first love.

Description: Swim instructor Yeonsu’s been given his hardest challenge yet: teaching A-list actor Juhwan Cha how to swim. What happens when the actor proposes something entirely unexpected?
Tagline:
Dating while Famous

Let me be your trophy.
With her wealth, status, and godlike strength, Duke Serena has it all — everything but her heart, that is. Enter Ricardo, a charming prince who claims to know its whereabouts and proposes an alliance that would benefit them both. Is this mysterious suitor really the key to regaining her lost heart?

Description:
Don't believe a word she says.
Infamous jailbreaker Rosen Walker is finally being transferred to the Isle of Monte, the most notorious maximum security prison in the world. Her guard? None other than the beloved war hero of the empire himself — Ian Connor. Now he must unravel the truth. Is Rosen really a murderer? Or is there more to the story?

Description:
No new clothes for a whole year?!
After finding out her rent is going to increase, Jina Yoon decides it's time for her to move. But wait... She's broke because she spent all her money on clothes! Join Jina on her year-long challenge to not buy any new clothing. Will she be able to end her addiction to shopping?
Tagline: A wild social experiment makes a woman re-prioritize her life

In the storm sleeps a giant...

Description:
I feel better when I'm on the pole!
Despite the taboo surrounding it, pole dancing is one of the most vigorous physical exercises out there. Though initially self-conscious about her new hobby, our protagonist learns to love her own body and herself through the art of pole dancing. So, then... Shall we dance?

Description:
Trying new things is never easy.
Ohran Lim is an ex-boxer who never managed to go pro. Now, she spends her days working at the local convenience store, wondering where it all went wrong. But after she meets young couple Woon and Baram, she slowly begins to change her outlook on life. "I need to find what makes me happy."

Description:
A cat, a corgi and lots of fun!
